name: Tigerblood the Game
description: A browser based game based on the MERN Stack, designed as an homage to our web development cohort.

name: My Reading List
description: A MERN stack application designed to return search results from Google Books API and perform CRUD operations.

name: Innovate Rx
description: A MVC framework app designed to simulate virtual medical visits with your favorite doctor!

name: Employee Directory
description: A REACT based application using the employee generator API to create a randomized list of company employees.

name: PennyWise
description: This Progressive Web Application uses Indexed Database, Service Worker and Web Manifest to simulate a financial transaction recorder that is able to log transactions with or without an internet connection.

name: Stay In Shape
description: This MVC and MongoDB based app is designed to log the user's workouts and display vital information gleaned from this data in a graphical form for easy comprehension.

name: Suitcase
description: A travel app focused on providing vital at-a-glance data on any city in the world.

name: Blog This!
description: A basic blog site using an MVC framework and SQL CRUD operations.

name: Jot It Down!
description: A quick note taker app, because who needs to remember their grocery list?!

name: Business - Behind The Scenes
description: A server-side framework for the behind the scenes operations of an e-commerce company.

name: Rain Or Shine!
description: An application designed to use 3rd party APIs to provide weather related information.

name: Team Builder
description: A CLI application designed to display cards containing all information for all members of a team.

name: Manage My Employees
description: A CLI application designed to manage employees of a small business.

name: Password Generator
description: A simple JavaScript based application designed to generate random passwords.

name: README Generator
description: A CLI application designed to generate markdown files for repositories, following Good Readme guidelines.

name: Daily Game Plan
description: A local storage based application designed to plan your day by the hour.

name: Console Log Skills
description: A basic front end application designed as a quiz based on your coding knowledge.
